title: Institute for Basic Problems of Marxism-Leninism
text: The Communist Party’s Institute for Basic Problems of Marxism-Leninism () was a <a href="marxism">Marxist</a> <a href="think%20tank">think tank</a> of the <a href="Polish%20United%20Workers%27%20Party">Polish United Workers' Party</a>, existing from 1974 to 1984. In 1984 it was transformed into the <a href="Academy%20of%20Social%20Sciences">Academy of Social Sciences</a> ("Akademia Nauk Społecznych").
